sentences.en: Her father was the region's most distinguished doctor and, as a child, Jewett often accompanied him on his round of patient visits.
sentences.cn: 她的父亲是该地区最杰出的医生，作为一个孩子，朱伊特经常陪同他访问的病人在他周围。

sentences.en: In his short story A White Heron, Jewett ingeniously combines the colors of white and black with some common images that enhance the story's expressiveness and artistic appeal.
sentences.cn: 在短篇小说《白苍鹭》中，作者朱厄特匠心独具地将白和黑两种颜色与普通的意象相互结合起来，从而达到强化小说的艺术表现力和感染力的目的。

sentences.en: Sarah Orne Jewett's writing is as neat and unaffected as the homes of her characters.
sentences.cn: 朱厄特的文笔简洁大方,就象她笔下人物的房舍一样.

sentences.en: Then, she took Sarah Orne Jewett's suggestion to write novels about Nebraska life.
sentences.cn: 后来，她听从萨拉·奥恩·朱维特的建议开始创作反映内布拉斯加生活的小说。

trans.tran_cn: (Sarah Orne 1849-1909，美国乡土文学女作家)朱厄特
